creator: egli@apache.org
text:
Static resources are served via the resources sitemap. This works for static
stuff such as css and static images. However it doesn't work for resources that
are stored under {publication-id}/resources/{area}{document-id}.

It would be nice if the resource serving could be done from one sitemap instead
of  duplicating this code in each publication sitemap.
